“shri lankawe prawinathama manawa himikam kriyadhariniyak”, “yahapath da nirmanayata wehesuna diriya mawak”, “samaja sadharanathwaya”, “manawa nidahasa nam sadathanika aragalaya wenuwen jiwithaya kapa kala,” yanadi wadan se ma “shri lankeya sthriwadi kathikawa darshanika thalayata osawa thabime pramukha sthriwadiniyak” lesin aya gana kawipada liyaweddi ehi pasubim kathawa sinhalen kiyawanna amathaka kala yuthu nowe.
wiwahayen pasu kalak gatha weddi dedena athara sharirika sambandhathawalata unanduwa kramayen hina wima wiwaha jiwithawaladi muhuna denna wena pradhana gataluwak.
saheli nathara une thigassila.

ma dadi thiranayak gaththa.

ethana premayak natha.
